## LiDAR Point Cloud Processing {#standard .emphasized data-background="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573339607881-208e75e4b267?ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80"}

- Import laz file to R
- Classify Ground Points
- Calculate DTM
- Height Normalization
- Calculate DSM and CHM (Canopy Height Model)
- Detect Tree Tops
